<PRE>Ok, I was finally able to catch what the error says.  All the previous times 
everything had closed before I could read it.  The error says that it 
couldn't load                 saved game save0.  I tried to find some of my 
old saved game files and import them but couldn't find them.  Got any 
suggestions?
